New, smart and brilliantly chic.
2 Sold, Only 1 Left
Brand new and constructed with optimum comfort, style and quality in mind, this beautiful townhouse presents a highly attractive proposition for the first-home buyer, retiree, empty nester or investor.
Distinct and defined, the brick-veneer exterior offers a sharp first impression, with the overall design achieving a fresh and spacious living experience. Bursts of natural light from the large windows effortlessly sweep across the single-level layout, harmonising perfectly with the lofty ceilings, solid European oak flooring and neutral palette.

The master beautifully accommodates a sizable walk-in robe (fitted) and luxurious ensuite boasting a semi-frameless rain shower and twin stone vanity. Two additional bedrooms are zoned away from the master, along with the main bathroom featuring a rain shower and separate bath. Furthermore, the inclusion of a study, covered patio and secure backyard finishes the picture nicely.
This address is located within close walking distance to McAdam Square Shopping Centre, bus stop, restaurants, Ainslie Parklands Primary School, The Good Shepherd Primary School, Yarra Valley Grammar, Melba College, Lipscombe Park Reserve, as well as being just a short drive from Croydon Railway Station, hospitals and bike track.
Excelling in every way, there's a certain charm here that can only be truly appreciated in person.

Classic charm in Croydon Central.
Gracefully elevated on a spacious 835m2 (approx.) allotment within brief walking distance to Croydon Central, this character weatherboard establishes a feeling of timeless warmth and cohesion and offers the family generous proportions to enjoy.
Though unassuming from the street, nevertheless, this four-bedroom home well and truly delivers in terms of spaciousness. Admire a stunning series of living zones, including; sunken family area boasting wood heater, separate lounge enjoying beautiful polished floorboards, in addition to a delightful dining domain. The living areas each have a unique vibe of their own and present the opportunity for the family to socialise together or spend time apart. At the centre of the kitchen sits an island offering extra prep and storage space while stainless steel appliances include an electric oven and gas cooktop. A studio at the rear of the home presents the flexibility to use the space as a study, home office or teen retreat.
A winning combination of gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling and ceiling fans in all bedrooms has been well achieved, while other notable inclusions list as: high ceilings adding a sense of volume and space, large windows introducing light into the interior, storage cupboards throughout, LED lights, single garage, single carport, private backyard and views of the Dandenongs.
